channel.title: User Research on Xinning
channel.description: Recent content in User Research on Xinning

item.title: 饿了么-物流中台体验设计
item.description: Eleme is a leading local life service and instant delivery platform in China, dedicated to providing a “reliable and timely delivery” service to homes. Ele.me drives the digitalization of the local life market through technological innovation, continuously enhancing consumers’ urban service assurance and instant e-commerce shopping experience.

item.title: SEPHORA
item.description: SEPHORA is a French cosmetics brand founded in 1969. The 2020 Global Top 500 Most Valuable Brands list was released, with Sephora ranking 170th. During the past half year at Sephora, I worked as a UED intern in Digital Vnture Department.

item.title: Infinite Carbinet
item.description: Background: User research and product/service platform design focused on addressing the issue of zero waste in dormitories, with user research being a central component. 背景：针对宿舍零浪费问题的用户研究与产品和服务平台设计，其中用户研究为核心部分. With the goal of promoting low-carbon dormitories, we aim to address issues such as students finding it difficult to adopt low-carbon lifestyles, complex procedures, and weak motivation.
